content: As a topic for an upcoming meeting, I invited Felienne Hermans, the author of "The Programmer's Brain", to present to us about language design considerations, how people learn, and topics from her book. She enthusiastically agreed to come talk to us.
Who would be the right person organizing CTCFT to connect her to to coordinate the best date for this?

We plan to present the new scheme (described #ctcft > how to make planning more inclusive there) -- the basic idea is that we'll announce theme for next month (April) at this meeting and people can pitch ideas
As it happens I think that the next month topic was going to be "Learn" :)
but I'll have to double check that
